lessons.title: The Death of the Single Prompt
lessons.description: Why 2026 is about workflows, not prompts.
lessons.summary: Prompt engineering has evolved into 'Behavior Architecture'. Learn how to design entire systems of interaction rather than single-shot queries.

quiz_questions.question: What has replaced the 'Prompt Engineer' role?

lessons.title: Designing The Swarm
lessons.summary: How to use frameworks like LangGraph 2.0 and CrewAI to manage a 'swarm' of specialized agents (Researcher, Writer, Editor) to accomplish complex tasks.

quiz_questions.question: What is a 'swarm' in AI terms?
options: A group of specialized agents working together

lessons.title: Agent Control Planes
lessons.summary: Implementing an 'Agent Control Plane' to monitor, audit, and limit the actions of your autonomous agents to ensure safety and compliance.

lessons.title: Recursive Prompts
lessons.summary: Techniques for setting up recursive loops where the AI analyzes its own output performance and rewrites its own system prompt for better results next time.

lessons.title: Constitutional AI & Alignment
lessons.summary: Navigating the 2026 regulatory landscape. How to implement 'Constitutional AI' principles to ensure your agents act ethically without constant human oversight.
